name: mpv-bash-completion
tagline: Bash completion for the mpv video player
body:
A script for generating a Bash completion script for the popular [mpv
video player](https://github.com/mpv-player/mpv).
It features...

* Completion for all --options,
* Type-based completion for --option arguments for choices, flags,
  integers and floats,
* Completion for upper/lower bounds for integer- and float-type argument
  ranges where applicable,
* Regular file name completion.

## Installation

Besides using the methods below, you can always generate the script manually. See the [README](https://github.com/2ion/mpv-bash-completion/blob/master/README.mkd) for instructions.

The completion will work on any system running GNU Bash 4. **Mac OSX users will have to install Bash 4. The default Bash 3 OSX is shipping lacks a required shell built-in.**

The script can be built on any system having, besides **mpv**, the following programs available:

* GNU Bash 4 or greater
* GNU coreutils, or BSD alternatives for grep, sed, cut, column, tail

### Arch Linux

[mpv-bash-completion-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/mpv-bash-completion-git) is available in the Arch User Repository and can be built using the [ABS](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Arch_Build_System). See [here](https://aur4.archlinux.org/cgit/aur.git/tree/PKGBUILD?h=mpv-bash-completion-git) for the PKGBUILD.

### Debian

You can build a package locally by following the instructions [on the debian branch](https://github.com/2ion/mpv-bash-completion/blob/debian/README.mkd).

Pre-built packages are available for download [here](https://bitbucket.org/2ion/mpv-bash-completion/downloads), though they may be obsolete.

## Bugs and Features

You may report problems on the [issue tracker](https://github.com/2ion/mpv-bash-completion/issues).

There's also a [support thread](http://crunchbang.org/forums/viewtopic.php?id=36226) on the #! CrunchBang Linux forums.
